text: "Lawyers, Guns and Money" is a 1978 song by Warren Zevon and is the closing track to his third studio album Excitable Boy. It was released as a single as an edited version. It was also a hit for Hank Williams Jr.. Category:1978 songs Category:Warren Zevon songs Category:Meat Loaf songs Category:The Wallflowers songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Lawyers, Guns and Money
